text: Kimberley Simms (born July 27, 1963 in Toledo, Ohio) is an American actress, best known for her role as Mindy Lewis on Guiding Light. Replacing actress Krista Tesreau in the role, Simms played the role from July 1989 until her departure in September 1992. Simms also appeared in an episode of Burke's Law, titled "Who Killed the Soap Star?" ==External links== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American soap opera actresses
